author: mturk
msg: Resolve (I hope) the WIN32 reported bug 12346. Caused by the
connection refusing on TC side during high load. If the TC refuses
connection keep trying instead of returng error.

author: hgomez
msg: Remove deprecated documentations, everything is now on xdocs

author: billbarker
msg: Add missing try-catch block for first try at getting the client-cert.
The first call was throwing out past the second call, so the re-negotiation never got a chance to happen.
